reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: MWALIMU - Una nuova divisione aziendale a Uithanage per accessori Italian South African Style moda in pelle

description.narrative: Avvio di una produzione di accessori in pelle prodotti con materiali di origine sudafricana unendo la tradizione dell'artigianato italiano e sudafricano
Start of a production of leather accessories produced with materials of South African origin, combining the tradition of Italian and South African craftsmanship

AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all
Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources

Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
